name: podamShouldHandleDoubleValuesWithThePodamDoubleValueAnnotation

testSteps.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.DoubleValuePojo

Then the object DoubleRangeValuesPojo ( doubleFieldWithMinValueOnly = 1.0    doubleFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 84.22113366997607    doubleFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 910.4905843239695    doubleFieldWithPreciseValue = 10.1245    doubleObjectFieldWithMinValueOnly = 1.0    doubleObjectFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 48.583192912668    doubleObjectFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 952.6112081787843    doubleObjectFieldWithPreciseValue = 10.1245     ) should not be null
Then the double value (0} should be greater or equal than 1.0
Then the double value 84.22113366997607 should be lower or equal than 100.0
Then the double value 910.4905843239695 should be between 1.0 and 1000.0
Then the double value 10.1245 should be exactly 10.1245
Then the object 10.1245 should not be null
Then the double value 10.1245 should be exactly 10.1245

title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped double values with @PodamDoubleValue annotation
